scripts.build:sdk: vue-cli-service build --target lib --dest sdk --name OpenPKG src/components/sdk/OpenPKG.js
scripts.build:sdk:watch: vue-cli-service build --target lib --dest sdk --name OpenPKG src/components/sdk/OpenPKG.js --watch
scripts.build:admin-panel: vue-cli-service build --target wc --dest admin_panel  --name admin-panel --inline-vue src/components/admin_panel/AdminPanel.vue
scripts.build:admin-panel:watch: vue-cli-service build --target wc --dest admin_panel  --name admin-panel --inline-vue src/components/admin_panel/AdminPanel.vue --watch
